books.title: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.description: A novel about the creation of a monster and the consequences of playing God.

books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.description: A novel about the moral and spiritual struggles of the main character, Raskolnikov, who murders an empress to free himself from the burden of poverty and guilt.

books.title: Days at the Morisaki Bookstore
books.author: Satoshi Yagisawa
books.description: A gentle, heartwarming story about a young woman who finds solace, healing, and a new sense of belonging while working at her uncle's old Tokyo bookstore.

books.title: Animal Farm
books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A satirical allegory by George Orwell, depicting a group of farm animals who overthrow their human farmer, only to face a new tyranny among themselves.

books.title: White Nights
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.description: A poignant Dostoevsky novella about a lonely dreamer in St. Petersburg who experiences a brief, transformative romance over four nights.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: Paulo Coelho's philosophical novel about Santiago, a shepherd boy who embarks on a journey to find a worldly treasure, discovering his personal legend along the way.

books.title: Tuesday's with Morrie
books.author: Mitch Albom
books.description: Mitch Albom's memoir recounting his weekly visits with his former college professor, Morrie Schwartz, who imparts life lessons while battling ALS.

books.title: Metamorphosis
books.author: Franz Kafka
books.description: Franz Kafka's surreal novella about Gregor Samsa, who wakes up one morning transformed into a giant insect, exploring themes of alienation and identity.

books.title: The Trial
books.author: Franz Kafka
books.description: Kafka's nightmarish novel about Josef K., a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, inaccessible authority, with the nature of his crime never revealed.

books.title: The Kite Runner
books.author: Khaled Hosseini
books.description: Khaled Hosseini's moving tale of friendship, betrayal, and redemption set against the backdrop of Afghanistan's turbulent history.

books.title: Siddhartha
books.author: Hermann Hesse
books.description: Hermann Hesse's philosophical novel about the spiritual journey of a young man named Siddhartha, who seeks enlightenment through meditation, self-discovery, and the pursuit of wisdom.

books.title: Ikigai
books.author: Hector Garcia and Francesc Miralles
books.description: Explores the Japanese concept of 'ikigai'—a reason for being—and how it can lead to a long, happy, and meaningful life.

books.title: Life is short and so is this book
books.author: Danny Meyer
books.description: A collection of practical, concise life lessons and reflections on happiness, success, and living with intention.

books.title: The psychology of money
books.author: Morgan Housel
books.description: Morgan Housel examines the ways people think about money, offering timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.

books.title: The miracle morning
books.author: Hal Elrod
books.description: Hal Elrod presents a morning routine designed to transform your life by improving productivity, motivation, and well-being.

books.title: Eat that frog
books.author: Brian Tracy
books.description: Brian Tracy's productivity guide focused on tackling your most important tasks first to overcome procrastination and achieve more.

books.title: Kybalion
books.author: Three Initiates
books.description: An exploration of Hermetic philosophy, presenting seven principles believed to underlie all existence and reality.

books.title: As a Man Thinketh
books.author: James Allen
books.description: James Allen's classic self-help book on the power of thought and its impact on character and circumstances.

books.title: The Third Door
books.author: Alex Banayan
books.description: Alex Banayan's journey to uncover how successful people break through and achieve their goals, revealing the 'third door' approach to life.

books.title: Dopamine Nation
books.author: Anna Lembke
books.description: Dr. Anna Lembke explores the neuroscience of pleasure and pain, addiction, and how to find balance in a dopamine-driven world.

books.title: Almanack of Naval Ravikant
books.author: Eric Jorgenson
books.description: Eric Jorgenson's collection of quotes from Naval Ravikant, a successful entrepreneur and investor.
